extensionDescription.message: Skip silent parts in videos and audio files.

savedTimeText.message: Using this extension you saved :time (MM:SS) of your time.

plusInfoHeader.message: Get more out of Skip Silence with Skip Silence Plus

plusInfoThankYou.message: Thank you for using "Skip Silence" to increase your productivity.

plusInfoWhatIsIt.message: To help keep the development of "Skip Silence" alive and to help expanding it to more browsers, some more advanced features require "Skip Silence Plus".

plusInfoPricing.message: "Skip Silence Plus" is a one-time payment of $6 and allows you to activate Plus across all your personal devices - so you won't have to purchase mutliple licenses!
